verses.verse: For <S%H3117><s%>, behold, in those days, and in that <S%H6256>time<s%>, when I shall bring <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>,

I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> all <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and will bring them <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%>; and I will execute <S%H8199>judgment<s%> upon them there for my <S%H5971>people<s%> and for my <S%H5159>heritage<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom they have <S%H6340>scattered<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: and they have <S%H2505>parted<s%> my <S%H776>land<s%>,

and have <S%H3032>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and have <S%H5414>given<s%> a <S%H3206>boy<s%> for a <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, and <S%H4376>sold<s%> a <S%H3207>girl<s%> for <S%H3196>wine<s%>, that they may <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

Yea <S%H6865><s%>, and what are ye to me, O Tyre, and <S%H6721>Sidon<s%>, and all the <S%H1552>regions<s%> of <S%H6429>Philistia<s%>? will ye <S%H7999>render<s%> me a <S%H1576>recompense<s%>? and if ye <S%H1580>recompense<s%> <S%H7031>me<s%>, swiftly and <S%H4120>speedily<s%> will I <S%H7725>return<s%> your <S%H1576>recompense<s%> upon your own <S%H7218>head<s%>.

Forasmuch as ye have <S%H3947>taken<s%> my <S%H3701>silver<s%> and my <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and have <S%H935>carried<s%> into your <S%H1964>temples<s%> my <S%H2896>goodly<s%> precious <S%H4261>things<s%>,

and have <S%H4376>sold<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto the sons of the <S%H3125>Grecians<s%>, that ye may remove them <S%H7368>far<s%> from their <S%H1366>border<s%>;

behold <S%H5782><s%>, I will stir them up out of the <S%H4725>place<s%> whither ye have <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H7725>them<s%>, and will return your <S%H1576>recompense<s%> upon your own <S%H7218>head<s%>;

and I will <S%H4376>sell<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and they shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> them to the men of <S%H7615>Sheba<s%>, to a <S%H1471>nation<s%> far <S%H7350>off<s%>: for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.

Proclaim <S%H7121><s%> ye this among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; <S%H6942>prepare<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%>; stir <S%H5782>up<s%> the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>; let all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> draw <S%H5066>near<s%>, let them come <S%H5927>up<s%>.

Beat <S%H3807><s%> your <S%H855>plowshares<s%> into <S%H2719>swords<s%>, and your <S%H4211>pruning-hooks<s%> into <S%H7420>spears<s%>: let the <S%H2523>weak<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, I am <S%H1368>strong<s%>.

Haste <S%H5789><s%> <S%H935>ye<s%>, and come, all ye <S%H1471>nations<s%> round <S%H6908>about<s%>, and gather yourselves together: <S%H5439>thither<s%> cause thy mighty <S%H1368>ones<s%> to come <S%H5181>down<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Let the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5782>bestir<s%> <S%H5927>themselves<s%>, and come up to the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%>; for there will I <S%H3427>sit<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

Put <S%H7971><s%> ye in the <S%H4038>sickle<s%>; for the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> is <S%H1310>ripe<s%>: <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H3381>tread<s%> <S%H1660>ye<s%>; for the winepress is <S%H4390>full<s%>, the <S%H3342>vats<s%> <S%H7783>overflow<s%>; for their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is <S%H7227>great<s%>.

Multitudes <S%H1995><s%>, <S%H1995>multitudes<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H2742>decision<s%>! for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H2742>decision<s%>.
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> are <S%H6937>darkened<s%>, and the <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H622>withdraw<s%> their <S%H5051>shining<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H7580>roar<s%> from <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and <S%H5414>utter<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7493>shake<s%>: but <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will be a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

So shall ye <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H7931>dwelling<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>: then shall <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> be <S%H6944>holy<s%>, and there shall no <S%H2114>strangers<s%> pass through her any <S%H5674>more<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall drop <S%H5197>down<s%> sweet <S%H6071>wine<s%>, and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> shall <S%H3212>flow<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%>, and all the <S%H650>brooks<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H3212>flow<s%> with <S%H4325>waters<s%>; and a <S%H4599>fountain<s%> shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and shall <S%H8248>water<s%> the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H7851>Shittim<s%>.

Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall be a <S%H8077>desolation<s%>, and <S%H123>Edom<s%> shall be a <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, for the <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, because they have <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in their <S%H776>land<s%>.
But <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H3427>abide<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation<s%>.
And I will <S%H5352>cleanse<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%>, that I have not <S%H5352>cleansed<s%>: for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7931>dwelleth<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
